product_details.description: This top secret “super solution” has been formulated to create the biggest, brightest, most colorful bubbles on earth! You’ll be ready for hours and hours of fun with your favorite gazillion products with this oversized solution refill bottle. This premium solution is eco-friendly, safe, non-toxic, and will not stain clothing or furniture. With Gazillion Bubbles, you’ll run out of breath before you run out of bubbles! Great Bubbles for Kids.  Appropriate for ages 3 years and up. Multi-color.

banner_details:
This vibrant banner features a cheerful and playful design tailored for a children's product. The background is a soft sky-blue filled with semi-transparent polka dots in purple, green, and white, resembling bubbles. At the center, the main product image labeled `product_image` is prominently placed, adding emphasis to the product. The headline `heading` uses a bold, fun font in a deep purple, followed by a subheading `subheading` in green, describing the product’s functionality. Near the bottom, the price is highlighted using `price` in bold purple, above a green call-to-action button `cta_button` with white text `cta`. A purple wave-shaped footer adds a lively base.

**Color Palette**:
- Sky Blue `#84D9FF` (Background)
- Deep Purple `#560F99` (Heading & Price)
- Fresh Green `#1E8A2E` (Subheading & Button)
- White `#FFFFFF` (Accent Text & Bubbles)
- Light Purple `#A64AFF` (Decorative Circles)
- Bright Green `#4CFF74` (Decorative Circles)
product_color: The product image uses a lively and playful color palette, ideal for children's advertising. Dominant colors include vibrant lime green (#7CF265) for the liquid, which radiates energy and freshness. Purple (#8F3FB4) is used in the cap and background label, creating a rich contrast that draws attention. Bright yellow (#FFD700) outlines the word "BUBBLES" to highlight excitement and joy. Accents of deep blue (#2A49B1) and red (#E53935) in the logo and text enhance the visual diversity. These colors blend harmoniously while remaining distinct, creating a dynamic and eye-catching aesthetic perfect for a fun, bubbly theme in promotional banners.
